title: no, rengar does not perform as well now as he did previously
body: yes, that was kind of the point

replies.body:
They nerfed Rengar and left ahri untouched.  Ahri players had less average games on their champ, 5% higher winrate, and 10% higher pickrate.  

Bias or nah?
ahri has counterplay, renagr didnt have enough, you saw the alert it was already too late and you didnt even have time to flash away or cc when he jumps you died before he even touched the ground

And that's based on what?  Feeding a Rengar 15 kills and still expecting to win?

Ahri's way more broken.

> [{quoted}](name=UltraScept,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyY80qGr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-30T05:07:56.316+0000)
>
> And that's based on what?  Feeding a Rengar 15 kills and still expecting to win?
> 
> Ahri's way more broken.

You haven't seen Rengar if you think he has to be fed to one shot.

> [{quoted}](name=Hayaishi2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyY80qGr,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-30T05:13:00.791+0000)
>
> You haven't** seen** Rengar if you think he has to be fed to one shot.

he probably got oneshotted before he could see the rengar

> [{quoted}](name=Hayaishi2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyY80qGr,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-30T05:13:00.791+0000)
>
> You haven't seen Rengar if you think he has to be fed to one shot.

rengar one shots you with the trackers knife.
Agreed. Ahri is objectively a more faceroll champ than Rengar that wins more games. She is literal freelo.
Unlike Rengar however, you can dodge Ahri's burst, no matter how fed she is.
Except foxfire.
You can dodge half her kit, I'd say.
Yeah, because half of her kit is skill shots.
Which is good.
Exactly.
That's not true. Her w + ult aren't skillshots. I had many games as adc where I got killed by just a w + 1 or 2 ult charges.
If Ahri kills you with W+R then I don't even know how she got that fed.
But what they did wasn't adding counterplay , it was just making Rengar complete ass to play with that E change.

Because balancing his E as a skillshot -- increasing the damage and power behind the CC -- totally wasn't abused and broken when used with its 0 cast time point blank option in your combo.

Might as well have the "0 counterplay point click" weaker bola back if it's gonna be used like this anyway.
I like the new rengar especially with stormraiders surge, it is fun very fun, also, build jungle item>hydra>ghostblade>deaths dance>bloodthirstier and fit boots in anywhere, works like a charm
except the part where you can't actually kill carries now unless you build crit
crit rengar is fun {{item:1412}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3036}}
i hope you are taking 10 cdr in runes atleast with that build

Nah nah nah, all crit damage runes.

For maximum crit power.
actually 5 since i am too lazy to change them

The main thing they're doing is making him still fluid while nerfing his numbers a bit to make him less oppressive.

They're not going to do what they did to Akali to Rengar (make her ridiculously not fluid and rather clunky), and seeing as to how they're buffing Akali the wrong way, they probably need a dev like that for her too. They're giving Rengar counterplay (no more bolas right as he lands, so you can dodge it, as well as number drops and indicator increases) but they're going to align it to something not shitty for both parties.
wtf hes still fluid to you?

He is. This is kind of the first time in lol history when playing rengar begins to demand skill.. (harder decisions than before) I actually had a rengar in my team who performed really well today and didn't just blindly hop into enemy team katarina-style.
you are either dumb or silver if you think he requires no skill and all he needs to do is button mash. There is a big difference between good rengars and the mediocre ones

The post was meant as somehow provocative - I wanted to know how his playstyle has changed. 

My point was that before mini-rework rengar was.. Pretty much too reliable. I have nothing against players who actually think what they're doing while playing rengar. There are also this kind of players who have ridiculously abused his broken stature while not rly being into him.

His playstyle changed because now rengar cant just ult through the lane and pick up a kill without being seen by a single ward. Now i have to gank with my ult through the river which means there is a chance of being seen by a ward. Also because of the ult nerfs, it feels like people are just too prepared when rengar is about to jump on someone. Whats the point of being invisible if the enemy knows you are there long before you can even jump on them <.<

the Bola change Was not even a fair nerf it is just an annoying mechanic they put into the game so rengar could not one shot. The thing is, is that unless he is ridiculously fed and crits; he cant really do an authentic one shot. I know what you mean though, i have seen alot of bad rengar lately, and although it will discourage them from wanting to play rengar, it will also discourage me from playing rengar because he is hardly on par with other junglers (and a really shitty top laner) the way he is right now. (even though im a rengar main)

Thanks for {{summoner:13}}. I mean, is he really that bad now? I have also seen several really good rengars this patch.

Jokes on you, I'm an aatrox main.

Yea I can still play rengar really well, but its only because of the amount of experiance i have the the champion. Rengar mains are going to continue to play him, so will I (because i have the most fun at league when i play him despite the fact i dont like the position he is in right now), I just dont like the clunky bola mechanic they thought was a brilliant idea to put in and i hope they fix it.

> [{quoted}](name=FortisDominus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyY80qGr,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2016-01-31T01:56:42.609+0000)
>
> you are either dumb or silver if you think he requires no skill and all he needs to do is button mash. There is a big difference between good rengars and the mediocre ones

Can confirm.  Souce: I am a button mashing mediocre rengo scrub.
ahri at least u can dodge her skills, her aa doesnt do as much as rengar, but u cant really dodge an auto can u now?
{{champion:24}}
100% dodge chance never forget

the nerf to rengars bola was what led to this fuckfest. the bola just made rengar more clunky and wierd to play and not fun. nerfs are meant to make champs weaker (such as the onhit q nerf), not to make the champ feel worse to play)
you can say rengar is overpowered and ill agree for the sake of it. even though as a rengar main i can say that rengar has a hard time killing squishies if team simply group. most people complaining are just low elo playyers that dont know how to counter these champs.
there should alos be a seperate tab for pinks late game. 
salty vaynes gonna downvote to hell

No a rengar built tank will not come close to one shotting a carry. Hes an assassin with high burst damage and no escapes. Pubs hate him cuz the team usually isnt coordinated enough to group up and throw cc on the squishies when he tries to gank em. He goes in, gets a kill and dies. OR he goes in tries to get a kill and dies. If its more then that, hes fed af or your team is incompetent. Personally i feel like assassins that can go in and lay waste to an enemy team and get out safely (jax, lee sin, zed) are far more unhealthy. That beng said the nerfs dont look like they will kill him completely. Theres always that new assassin item.

{{item:1412}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3009}} Would jump in, one shot a carry, then sit around in the teamfight shredding the fuck out of anyone who stood near him after he slaughtered the rest of your backline.

Check his kit. Unlike other assassins, it can support a bruiser build.

The changes made it so that he is less likely to one shot unless he is building as an assassin
It isn't just pubs lmao. Almost every single Rengar I've seen watching high elo streams ends up ahead or fed.

I've never been a great Rengar player but mediocre and I thoroughly enjoyed playing Rengar before, but with the cast time on his e I find it nearly impossible to land as you either throw it before you jump (revealing yourself ) or you throw it after you land as they sidestep/flash/blink/dash. 

Unless the Rengar is fed af you would usually use your empowered bola for the lock down but it's not longer viable to use unless you plan on landing first using a couple aa then throwing the bola. 

Every Rengar I've seen has done terrible as well as every time I play him. 

Dumpster tier. Ruined a legit fun to play champion

It's almost like all us Veigar player weren't just whining when our kill secure ability was nerfed like this, but everyone said it would be just fine, learn to deal with it.

So, Rengar will be just fine. Learn to deal with it.
this is irrelevant because rengar and veigar have to different kits and they are 2 different types of champions.

How? 

Veigars kit is designed to delete one champion in one rotation of abilities. He has one ability that he requires to hold down his target and is useless after his rotation is over.

Rengars kit is designed to delete one champion in one rotation of abilities.  He has one ability that he requires to hold down his target and...wait, he has alot of gap closers, stealth and shit to make his assassination easier for him AND he has no resource to hold him back.

If Veigar can still get in and blow up a carry with his CC on a delay, Rengar should have no problem doing it too.
Although lategame Veigar's ulti will oneshot any ADC without banshee's, unlike Reng-OH WAIT
That's if Veigar can even get close enough to target them without getting deleted in the current mobility creep/assassin meta.
Ah yes

the thing is veiger can  blow up some one from a distance,  rengar has to get into the fray  to kill his target,if there was a delay  he'll get blown up at an instant. And some thing people forget is that adcs have a support, and shit like janna, lulu, and alistar makes it impossible to kill their adc. IMO They  are the sole reasons why assassins rengar, akali and talon exist because withut them adcs like {{champion:18}},{{champion:67}},and{{champion:429}}    will be broken and difficult to deal with. not to mention we have this lazy supporting enabler in the game{{summoner:3}}

And how exactly is Veigar supposed to blow up Trist, Vayne, and Kalista when the moment they see the casting ring for his secure tool they use their move ability to get out of range? 

Atleast Rengar can stealth in on them and leap getting him close enough to {{summoner:3}}  or just annihilate them with his rotation.

Rengar was already balanced. Yeah, he gets to delete one person every time his ult is up, which is every 40 seconds late game. If you're actually playing the game correctly, the rest of your team will delete him as soon as he does this and now it's a 4v4. And if he doesn't have ult, he's literally useless. Like more useless than Blitz without his Q. Wow such broken. QQ more plebs.
